page.title: 04Life Style Girl aged 10
page.content: I get up at 7:00am with Dad shouting from the bathroom. I have breakfast, cereal and toast, and go to school. I get to school at about 9:OO and play and chat in the playground. School starts at 9:30. We have register while we read for twenty minutes. Then we start work. We have play at 10.45 for fifteen minutes. Then we work until half past 12, which is dinner time. Some of us have sandwiches, some cooked dinner and some go home. Then we play on the playground or field until 1.30. Sometimes we have assembly, which lasts about 20 minutes and finishes at 3.30. After school I go home and play. I have my tea, which is usually a cooked meal at 6:00. Then I play till 7:00. I usually watch T.V. and go to bed at 8:00 ready for school in the morning.
